title: T 206 For Sale some beauties Round 2

posts.post_title: T 206 For Sale some beauties Round 2
posts.post_content:
More t206 nice for the grade.

Powell PSA 2 no creases Sov 150 35.00 SOLD
George Brown Chicago very nice e PSA 3 light crease 50.00 SOLD
Steamer Flanagan PSA 4.5 Clean old mill reverse 55.00 SOLD
Bob Ganley PSA 3.5 Piedmont 150 50.00 SOLD
Oberlin Clean clean SGC 50 slight scuff on Front OLD mill beautiful card 45.00
L. Tannehill SGC 35 immaculate except for small tape stain in back 40.00
F. Smith Chicago SGC 35 immaculate except for small tape stain in back 40.00

Thanks all pm r email to [url]ddm4236@comcast.net[/url]
Doug, sending you a message on the Frank Smith.

Doug,

The Oberlin arrived today and it looks great.

Thank you very much for another smooth transaction.

Best Regards,

Eric

Doug,

The Smith and Tannehill arrived today, beautifully packaged. What a tremendous start to my T206 collection! I cannot thank you enough. Our forum, and our hobby, are lucky to have you.

Bill
